Package com.example.fairdraw.Adapters

Class EventArrayAdapter

java.lang.Object
android.widget.BaseAdapter
android.widget.ArrayAdapter<Event>
com.example.fairdraw.Adapters.EventArrayAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Adapter, Filterable, ListAdapter, SpinnerAdapter, ThemedSpinnerAdapter
public class EventArrayAdapter extends ArrayAdapter<Event>
An adapter for the event list view.

This ArrayAdapter adapts Event objects into the R.layout.event_content view for display in a ListView or similar AdapterView. It also exposes two listener interfaces so the host activity/fragment can respond to edit button clicks and card clicks separately.

  • Method Details

    • getView

      @NonNull public View getView(int position, @Nullable View convertView, @NonNull ViewGroup parent)
      Bind an Event at the provided position into the list item view.

      This method inflates R.layout.event_content when necessary and populates its fields (title, location, date, capacity, price). It also wires the edit button and the card click to the adapter's listeners if they are provided.

      Specified by:
      getView in interface Adapter
      Overrides:
      getView in class ArrayAdapter<Event>
      Parameters:
      position - adapter position to bind
      convertView - recycled view (may be null)
      parent - parent view group
      Returns:
      the bound view for display
